statements: SELECT * FROM points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, points_amount FROM points ORDER BY points_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_amount FROM points WHERE points_amount > 100;
SELECT points_amount, user_id FROM points WHERE user_id IN (2,4,6);
SELECT COUNT(user_id) as total_users FROM points;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT points_amount, user_id FROM points ORDER BY points_amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(points_amount) AS total_points FROM points WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM points WHERE user_id != 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(points_amount) AS avg_points FROM points;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT points_id, points_balance, customer_id FROM points;
SELECT customer_id, points_balance FROM points ORDER BY points_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT transaction_amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT points_id, points_balance FROM points WHERE points_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points_balance) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 5000;

SELECT points.customer_id, transactions.transaction_date, transactions.transaction_amount FROM points JOIN transactions ON points.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, points FROM points ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE loyalty_level > 2;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM transactions WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE loyalty_level > 1
SELECT * FROM points ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT users.name, transactions.points_earned FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id
SELECT * FROM points
SELECT user_id, points FROM points WHERE user_id=1
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY user_id
SELECT name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100 ORDER BY points_required ASC
SELECT user_id, points FROM points WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, points FROM points WHERE points >= 100 ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT * FROM users JOIN points ON users.user_id = points.user_id WHERE points > 50
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT users.username, rewards.name FROM users, rewards WHERE users.user_id = 1 AND rewards.points_required < 500 ORDER BY rewards.name
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, reward_name, claimed FROM user_rewards WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE points_total > 100;
SELECT user_id, points_total FROM points WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT users.username, rewards.reward_name FROM users JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
